name: TERLIPRESSIN ACETATE
breadcrumbs: 6.5 Hypothalamic and pituitary hormones and anti-oestrogens
side-effects:
Side-effects see under Vasopressin, but
effects milder
doses:
By intravenous injection, 2 mg followed
by 1 or 2 mg every 4 to 6 hours until bleeding is controlled, for
up to 72 hours
